wikipedia_page.main: Grant Thomas Thornton (born 29 August 1992) is an English cricketer. He made his List A debut for Warwickshire in the 2017 Royal London One-Day Cup on 27 April 2017. He made his first-class debut for Warwickshire in the 2017 County Championship on 19 May 2017.

link_mentions.page: List of Warwickshire County Cricket Club players
